XIV.2.B.2.c
.
Review of CAPRI Records on DMF Matches
If the Veteran was hospitalized at a VA medical facility, use the Compensation and Pension Record Interchange (CAPRI) to determine whether the Veteran has died.
Reference
:Â  For more information on CAPRI and beneficiaries institutionalized at VA expense, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iii, 1.A
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 2, Section B - Social Security Death Master File (DMF) Match
